# LatinR 2018

LatinR 2018 fue el 4 y 5 de septiembre de 2018


```{r, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
library(yaml)
library(purrr)

team <- read_yaml("_data/team.yml") 

names(team) <- map_chr(team, 1)

# Hace las chairs

.x <- team[[3]]

list_people <- function(.x) {
  title <- .x$name$es
  
  make_person <- function(person) {
    if (person$level == "cientifico") {
      paste0("* ", person$name, " ", person$surname, " (", 
             person$titles, ")")
      
    } else {
      paste0("*  ", person$name, " ", person$surname, "\n     *  ", 
             paste0(person$titles, collapse = "\n     *  "))
    }
  }
  
  
  people <- map_chr(.x$people, make_person) %>%
    paste0(collapse = "\n ")
  
  cat(paste0("## ", title, "\n\n", people, "\n\n"))
}

walk(team, list_people)
```
